See this post for details.

Photonvision Lib 2025.1.1 LabVIEW - released NI LabVIEW
This library was updated to match the changes to photonvision version 2025.1.1. Installation files and additional information can be found in the link below. Note that a new time sync server has been added. While not mandatory, it should be placed by itself in periodic tasks. Do NOT place this VI in a loop! See the examples for additional information.
